result.purpose: Defines GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD processes, including running tests and checks for a Go project.
result.architecture: The folder follows a CI/CD architecture pattern, utilizing GitHub Actions to automate testing and code quality checks.

.github/workflows/checks.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for running unit tests, copyright checks, and linting for a Go project.
side_effects: Modifies git configuration for line endings
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information in logs
Dependency on external actions may introduce vulnerabilities
